div.style: display: flex; position: relative; flex-direction: column
display: flex; position: relative; top: 0px; left: 0px; align-items: flex-start; flex-direction: row; margin-left: 20px
display: flex; position: relative; align-items: flex-start; flex-direction: column

label.style: position: relative; line-height: 28px; color: #99000000; font-size: 24px; font-weight: normal; align-self: flex-start
position: relative; margin-top: -2px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; line-height: 24px; color: {chargeLabelColor}; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; align-self: flex-start

font-weight: bold; text-overflow: ellipsis; margin-top: -2px; position: relative; align-self: flex-start; color: {amountColor}; overflow: hidden; line-height: 24px; font-size: 22px; text-decoration: {lineThrough}

img.style: width: 78px; height: 98px; position: absolute; align-self: flex-start

label.style: position: relative; margin-top: -2px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; line-height: 28px; white-space: nowrap; color: #364259; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; text-stroke: 2px #FFFFFF
